metadata.title: CVE-2017-3456 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server: DML). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.54 and earlier,5.6.35 and earlier and 5.7.17 and earlier. Easily "exploitable"vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access viamultiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of thisvulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang orfrequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 BaseScore 4.9 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3456` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test-data - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.18-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mariadb-10.0 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
